extendedInfo.description: Fast paced, straight forward gameplay, clean visuals and competitive online competition is what face hopping is all about. Put your facial awareness skills to the test in a thrill-packed challenge that leaves you on your toes, anticipating whatâs coming at you from around every corner. Whether youâre a hardcore gamer, want to challenge and compete against your friends or simply waiting for a bus, Face Hopper offers something for everyone.-Battle through 5 unique survival challenges-Challenge your friends to a point-grabbing feast-Compete with your country on your country's private leaderboard-Take on the world on the global leaderboard-Addictive gameplay that will capture your undivided attention-And much, much more!Please support the development of The Face Hopping Challenge by purchasing the full, ad free game. Please leave any feedback on the Play store.

reviews.title: S##t....
reviews.comment: Yes this game is fun but its so slow on my phone, this is my 1st game ive found that I like but its so getting one star till it gets sorted.... Sorry
reviews.author: Carrie Griffiths

reviews.title: Its cool
reviews.comment: But the direction buttons dont work half the time. Please fix.
reviews.author: Nick Jacobsen

reviews.title: Too awesome
reviews.comment: Mate the game is wikid, why aint it on the top free list? Jeez boo ya! Peace out
reviews.author: Alexander Lam

reviews.title: Woooooi
reviews.comment: Excellent. A truly absorbing experience. Well done son.
reviews.author: Edwina Lengyel

reviews.title: Amazing app
reviews.comment: Really addictive. I didn\'t expect it to be so good when i downloaded it but i must say i\'m... Mind-blown. Awesome awesome awesome!! ;)
reviews.author: Dinesh Lakhwani

reviews.title: Good game
reviews.comment: Could do with some sounds, but unique, creative idea that will keep you entertained for hours with cool leaderboards that let you see how well your doing vs the world. 5 stars
reviews.author: Mike Scweps

reviews.title: Great
reviews.comment: Addictive game, can\'t put it down!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Exceptional
reviews.comment: Really fun game which is very addictive
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Amazing
reviews.comment: Best game I\'ve ever played, the creator should take a bow. Me and my buddies always settle in for weekly face hopper sessions, its genuinly the highlight of my week.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: This is what I call a game !
reviews.comment: Downloaded it, played it, got addicted ... This is truly fun , play it everytime I came back from uni on the bus ! A game you have to try !
reviews.author: Addison Dieudonne
